content.description: Fun movement up through some cavernous jugs into a technical crux. Stay on the left bolt line.
content.location: Starts just right of the rocky outcropping on the rounded buttress. The first bolt is about 10feet up.

content.description: A little dirtier than its neighbor to the right, but still excellent climbing.  Also mega-sandbagged for the grade.  The crux comes about 2/3 of the way up where the holds get thin, and the bolts get spaced...
content.location: Left-most of two routes on the far left side of the Chronic Wall.

content.description: Great variety on beautiful stone on the left side of the Chronic wall. Find your way up some jugs the work some good holds under the left side of the roof. Just over the top are some holds good enough to awkwardly pull the lip and continue to the top. There is a middle anchor at 75' or continue to the top for full value.
content.location: The obvious boltline going up the left side of the chronic wall as you approach. The first line about 30' left of chronic.

content.description: Mostly big holds on a steep wall.  The crux comes around the 3rd bolt where the holds get slightly smaller.  Long run-out on easy terrain off the ground.
content.location: Far right side of the Chronic Wall, just right of an obvious crack.

content.description: Excellent climbing on featured rock, although mega-sandbagged for the grade.  The crux comes high on the route pulling a small bulge.  Expect a sporty finish.
content.location: Right-most of two routes on far left side of Chronic Wall.

content.description: Scramble to a high first bolt and follow the arÃªte as it begins to steepen into a short overhanging crux. Great warm-up.
content.location: Semi-separate prow/arete between the Chronic Wall and the Dog Den.

content.description: Start up a right-facing corner, then climb the slab on cool fluted features, sidepulls, and pinches.  The crux comes making a couple of long moves past some small crimps near the top.  Immaculate stone on this one.
content.location: Far right side of the Chronic Wall, just right of "Outie".
